title: The Wedding Singer
short_plot_summary: A heartbroken wedding singer, Robbie, forms an unexpected bond with an engaged waitress, Julia. As their friendship blossoms, they face challenges and discover what true love really means.
explanation: A broken heart, representing Robbie's heartbreak when Linda calls off their wedding
A microphone, symbolizing Robbie's profession as a wedding singer
A bride, representing Julia, the waitress Robbie meets and promises to sing at her wedding
An airplane, representing a crucial turning point in Robbie and Julia's relationship.
A male singer, depicting Billy Idol, who shows up to help out in the movie
